Dear My Lovebong3,

Thank you for your feedback, and we apologize for this inconvenience. We will improve our app for better performance in the future.

text: Tried to register, after I inserted the code they sent, I get the error message. "something went wrong". I wrote Pipay an email 3weeks ago asking for help no response yet. Can't use the app!!

text: cannot delete chart and don't required password for log in.  not security
replyText:
Dear Pak ly,

Please be informed that you can delete chat by swiping on the chat that you want to delete to the left, then you will see option "Delete". As for log in, we will send you One Time Password to your device inbox message everytime you log in. Please contact us by 1800 209 999 if you don't receive One Time Password when log in. Thanks!

Dear Heng Kim Nguon,

In order to do Cash-out from your wallet, please visit our branch or one of our hubs which you can find the locations by going to map in our app.

text: I feel the app is slow preformen please help improve it. thanks
replyText: Hello Ponleu. Thank you for using Pi Pay! The Pi Pay app is constantly evolving and improving, and performance is certainly a key area of focus for us. Have a great Pi Pay day.

text: It got crash sometime. However it's more easier than I can transfer from Aba to my pi pay account for new version. Thanks
replyText: We will keep developing our app to have better performance in the future. Thank you Dalin for using Pi Pay!

text: I like the cashless money in hand. It is easy to use. Deposit the money from pay and go and only need my phone number. Whenever I pay I only need my phone number and pin...  Great deal with many stores and restaurants discount.
replyText: Thank you so much for your review Thavry! We are big fans of your writing, and glad you are a fan of the app. Have a great Pi Pay day!

text: I think pay by scan it save but now why in cinema not pay by scan . It not save if have someone know my password they can take my money . So it make me can't top up money a lot in Pipay  Thank .
replyText: Thank you for your comments. Pi Pay takes customer security very seriously, and we urge all merchants to use the QR scan feature for payments. We will look into this, and please be assured that the safety of your money is key for us. Have a great Pi Pay day!

text: I hope Pi pay can cooperate with paygo wallet so that I can transfer money from one account to another for different purposes instead of going to paygo machine every single time.
replyText: Thank you for your comment. As Pi Pay continues to grow and develop, there will be more ways to transfer funds. We are confident you will like some upcoming announcements. Have a great Pi Pay day!

text: Everything is good except the cache of the banner and cause the error display in my Android Gallery. Can't bear the mess up cause by this app. Dev Team should look into this issue.

text: there is less online payment like movie ticket, booking online. I would give u 5 star if there is online payment with your merchant.
replyText: Thank you for your review Sothea. We have some very exciting announcements about online shopping coming soon that will make you happy I am sure!

text: it's ok. but i'm concern about securities. when i'm process payment some merchant require put phone number and pin without use QR code by reason internet slow. where the risk and solution?  when we put phone number and PIN s.o near you may see your information or some place of your merchant have camera, so they can use this information for next time. to prevent this risk, i wish you to use the one time password to support when we put phone number PIN and than OTP for confirm.
replyText: Thank you for your comment Samnang. Security is a primary concern for Pi Pay, and we assure you the system is very secure. The QR system is the primary method of authenticating payments, but merchants have the option for phone number + pin during busy periods. We are always working to make the app even better, and we welcome user feedback.

text: I am a bit concern about security. Sometime people at the merchant side as me to input phone number and pin directly since scanning can slow down the process of sell. What if someone remember my pin while I was typing in, surely they can use my account to pay. Most places have camera, someone behind me might see. What to do with this security issue?
replyText: Security is a primary concern for Pi Pay, and we assure you the system is very secure. The QR system is the primary method of authenticating payments, but merchants have the option for phone number + pin during busy periods. We are always working to make the app even better, and we welcome user feedback to help us in this, so thank you again.

text: I can not login, when I enter the password, this app always stop working...

text: A good app but will be better if there's more merchants. Plz coporate with some bookstores. I will be appreciated if I can buy books using Pipay. :)
